typeProperties.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	wildcardPaths:['Pre_dim/m_pre_dim_object.parquet']) ~> preDimObject
preDimObject derive(top_key = 'ALL',
		top_description = 'All Objects') ~> derivedTopLevel
derivedTopLevel alterRow(upsertIf(!isNull(top_key))) ~> alterRow
alterRow sink(input(
		PK_KEY as string,
		CPT_DESCRIPTION as string,
		CPT_NUMBER as integer,
		INSERTED_BY as string,
		DATE_INSERTED as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> dimObject
